0.text: Innate: Lillia's abilities apply Dream Dust against enemies hit, which deals「 6% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health total magic damage over 3 seconds, 」「 1% (+ 0.25% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds, 」capped at 40 − 100 (based on level) damage against  monsters.

1.text: Lillia  heals for 18 − 94 (based on level) (+ 6% AP) against large monsters and 12 − 140 (based on level) (+ 12% AP) against champions over the duration of Dream Dust, reduced to 33% effectiveness for each target beyond the first. She may only heal against 1 monster at a time.

0.text: Passive: Lillia gains a Prance stack for 5.5 seconds whenever she hits at least 1 enemy with her abilities, stacking up to 4 times, with the duration refreshing from subsequent ability hits. Stacks are lost by one every 1.5 seconds when the duration ends. Each stack grants Lillia  bonus movement speed.

1.text: Active: Lillia swings her censer around her, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit within the outer edge of the area additionally take the same amount as bonus true damage.

0.text: Active: Lillia  dashes to 150 units in front of the target area over 0.759 seconds, though not through terrain, and deals magic damage in an area around the target spot. Enemies hit within the center are dealt  200% increased damage.

1.text: Watch Out! Eep! deals 50% damage to  minions.

0.text: Active: Lillia lobs a seed at the target area that rolls forward indefinitely. The seed detonates upon colliding with an enemy or terrain upon landing or while rolling, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone,  slowing them by 40% for 3 seconds and  revealing them for 2 seconds.

1.text: Swirlseed will cast at max range if cast beyond that. The spot at which the seed will last collide with terrain is highlighted while it is rolling.

0.text: Active: Lillia casts a magical lullaby over all targetable enemy  champions affected by  Dream Dust, which arrives after 0.3 seconds and renders them  drowsy for 1.5 seconds,  slowing them by 10%. After the duration, they fall  asleep for a few seconds.

1.text: The next instance of non- persistent non- minion non-small and medium  monster damage taken by each of the  sleeping targets consumes the debuff to deal additional magic damage.

1.concerningText: Active: Lillia swings her censer around her, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit within the outer edge of the area additionally take the same amount as bonus true damage.

Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 60 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds. 」
